Note the reference to China?  This is not a real Japanese sword.  Never con=
sider buying any supposed Japanese sword offered on Ebay from a dealer from=
 China, who is not Roger Robertshaw.  And private sale auctions and anonymo=
us dealers are sure signs of fake swords.
